$mqtt_broker_desc.zh: 远程 MQTT Broker 的主机名和端口号，格式为：主机名:端口号。主机名通常是一个域名或者 IP 地址，例如 www.example.com，而端口号通常是 1883 或 8883。若端口未指定，则默认为 1883。
$mqtt_broker_desc.en: The hostname and port number of the remote MQTT Broker, in the format: hostname:port. The hostname is usually a domain name or IP address, such as www.example.com, while the port number is usually 1883 or 8883. If the port is not specified, it defaults to 1883.

$num_server_ids_desc.zh: MCP Server ID 的数量，范围为 1 到 64。
$num_server_ids_desc.en: The number of MCP server Ids, ranging from 1 to 64.

$num_server_ids_validate_error.zh: MCP Server ID 数量必须在 1 到 64 之间。
$num_server_ids_validate_error.en: The number of MCP server Ids must be between 1 and 64.

$mqtt_username_desc.zh: 连接到 MQTT Broker 时使用的用户名。
$mqtt_username_desc.en: The username used to connect to the MQTT Broker.

$mqtt_password_desc.zh: 连接到 MQTT Broker 时使用的密码。
$mqtt_password_desc.en: The password used to connect to the MQTT Broker.

$mqtt_clientid_prefix_desc.zh: 连接到 MQTT Broker 时使用的客户端 ID。
$mqtt_clientid_prefix_desc.en: The client ID used to connect to the MQTT Broker.

$emqx_cluster_name_desc.zh: 集群的唯一名称，用于标识和管理集群。
$emqx_cluster_name_desc.en: The unique name of the cluster, used to identify and manage the cluster.
